description: Our mission at Jurlique is to help reconnect people with nature. All of our products contain the highest quality ingredients that only mother nature could provide. Jurlique: Calendula Cream This sensitive skin moisturizer contains real Calendula extract to help soothe, calm, and comfort irritated skin. It works to deeply hydrate dry skin, and protect against harmful environmental aggressors that can daily aggravate sensitive skin. Potent Ingredients With Powerful Results Only ingredients found in nature could provide us with exactly what we need for truly healthy, beautiful skin. Our Calendula Cream contains potent ingredients designed to clarify, calm and soften skin that is dry and irritated from harsh elements. Naturally Calm And Soothe Sensitive Skin To use, simply warm a small amount between fingertips and apply to skin as necessary for deep hydration that soothes, softens and clarifies sensitive skin. 100% Satisfaction Guarantee Jurlique offers a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you arent completely satisfied with your purchase, simply return the product for a full money back guarantee.  Our purpose is to inspire people to wellbeing through a connection to nature. We grow, harvest and extract concentrated botanicals at our organic farm in the South Australian hills to create pure and powerful skin care.
